Temazcales.title: Authentic Temazcales
Temazcales.description: Discover authentic temazcal masters in Amatlán. Connect with experienced guides offering traditional purification ceremonies with healing heat and medicinal plants.
Temazcales.aboutDescription1: The temazcal is an ancestral Mexican purification ceremony performed in a small enclosed shelter, similar to an igloo, traditionally built with natural materials.
Temazcales.aboutDescription2: During the ceremony, hot volcanic stones are introduced and vapors are created with water and infusions of traditional medicinal plants such as copal, sage and eucalyptus.
Temazcales.aboutDescription3: This profound experience allows physical, emotional and spiritual purification, connecting you with your deepest essence and with Mexico's millenary traditions.

Location.title: Journey to Amatlán's Magic
Location.subtitle: Mystical Location
Location.description: Discover why this mystical valley in Morelos, Mexico has been a pilgrimage destination for spiritual seekers for over 1,000 years.
Location.legendaryText: Amatlán de Quetzalcóatl sits in a mystical valley where the legendary Feathered Serpent is said to have been born. This powerful landscape has maintained its spiritual energy for millennia, making it the perfect setting for profound transformation.

features.mountainsDesc: Nestled in the mystical Sierra Madre del Sur, where ancient energy flows through volcanic peaks
features.springsDesc: Crystal-clear waters emerging from deep earth caves, charged with healing minerals and energy
features.forestDesc: Centuries-old trees creating a natural temple where indigenous ceremonies have been held for generations
features.climateDesc: Year-round temperate weather ideal for outdoor ceremonies and spiritual practices

Location.geometryDescription: Amatlán sits at the intersection of powerful energy lines that have been recognized by indigenous peoples for centuries. The natural formation of the valley, combined with underground water systems and volcanic energy, creates a unique energetic field perfect for spiritual transformation and healing.
